name: Robotuanity
description:
THEME : AS ABOVE, SO BELOW 

The game is set in era where Robots Race - Called Robotuanity ... is on the verge of extinction ... they are running on a special batteries which use a rare found metal called Xitananium. 

The story begins when uncle Robot ZoZo who is living on an island (to preserve their last set of batteries) calls robot YoYo for a mission to goto a planet called Xing YaYa, to fetch more Xitananium a  metal essential for building the batteries.

Will YoYo succeed? 

The project is largely built in past 7 days and currently at pilot level. 

The Team 
--------------
Sidharth (https://speplworks.itch.io/ )

Gameplay Instructions 
--------------

WASD - Basic Movemenent (Forwarrd, left, black, right) 
Space Bar - Jump
Space Bar Twice - Activate JetPack
Use Left Widgets on Screen to Move 
Use Right Widget on Screen to look around
List any content that was created before the jam

---------------

3D Model of Robot YoYo on the base foundation of Stack-O-Bot 
Some Ready part of Stack-O-Bot Unreal Project ... 

What is done in last 7 days ... 
-------- 
Game Logic to a very large extent - with Mission Assignments / Lives /  Music / Sounds / Background Dialogues Etc. 
Chaos System -- only one basic rock is broken yet at the beginning of planet XingYaYa. 
The foundation Island with ocean & landscape and - foliage / wind enabled / water / boat / replaced clouds / procedural palm trees etc. 
Streaming Levels in Gameplay of the Planet Xing Ya Ya. - I figured nanite rocks are quitre heavy.  
Game build went more than 1 GB so i had to cut down on few things, including replacing KitBash 3D Assets, but kitbash3D is amazing, I definatley will purchase their assets in near future. 

It is hugely underdeveloped, consider it only as pilot or demo project. 

p.s. It was orignally planned for Androi, had some buildd issues so switched to windows temporarily, also figuring out other limitations. 

Ready Assets Used 
---------------
Funny Robot  : Marcello Barrio (Uncle Robet ZoZo)   
TwinMotion Boats Pack 1 - Epic Content
  

---------------

What Engine Version did you use to create your entry? 
Unreal Engine 5.0.3

Credits
---------------
Music & SFX :  https://www.weloveindies.com/ ( a huge thanks to them)
